amuse.nodes.processor.interfaces
Interface DimensionProcessorInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AORSplitter, BeatPruner, DataSampler, DerivationCalculator, IntervalSelector, NaNEliminator, NormalizerWithGivenMinMax, OnsetPruner, PrincipalComponentsAnalysis, RunningMeanCalculator, TatumPruner, ZeroMeanUnitVarianceNormalizer
public interface DimensionProcessorInterface

This interface defines the operations which should be supported by all feature and time dimension reducers.

Version:
$Id: DimensionProcessorInterface.java 1075 2010-07-01 14:06:24Z vatolkin $
Author:
Igor Vatolkin
